sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Boeing ( BA ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.7%.
Year to date, Boeing registers a 21.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Walmart ( WMT ), trading down 1.0%.
Walmart is lower by about 3.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.9%, and Apple ( AAPL ), trading up 1.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
